Lunara.name: Noxious Blossom
Lunara.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage.

Lunara.name: Crippling Spores
Lunara.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

Lunara.name: Wisp
Lunara.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. Lasts 45 seconds.

Lunara.name: Thornwood Vine
Lunara.description: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Stores up to 3 charges.

Lunara.name: Leaping Strike
Lunara.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

Lunara.name: Nature's Toxin
Lunara.description: Your Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 34 (+5% per level) damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

Lunara.name: Dryad's Swiftness
Lunara.description: Lunara moves 20% faster by leaping short distances.

1.name: Photosynthesis
1.description: Crippling Spores returns 10 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

1.name: Natural Perspective
1.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

1.name: Cruel Spores
1.description: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 Mana is restored.

4.name: Nimble Wisp
4.description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

4.name: Timelost Wisp
4.description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

4.name: Skybound Wisp
4.description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

4.name: Dividing Wisp
4.description: The first time a Wisp is relocated, it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location.

7.name: Siphoning Toxin
7.description: As long as Nature's Toxin is active on an enemy, heal 18 (+4% per level) Health a second.

7.name: Wild Vigor
7.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

7.name: Splintered Spear
7.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

7.name: Nature's Culling
7.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroes.

10.name: Thornwood Vine
10.description: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Stores up to 3 charges.

10.name: Leaping Strike
10.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Unfair Advantage
13.description: Nature's Toxin deals 50% more damage to Heroes that are slowed.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Greater Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Choking Pollen
16.description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

16.name: Star Wood Spear
16.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

16.name: Invigorating Spores
16.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Attack Speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

16.name: Let Them Wither
16.description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 50% and causes it to no longer decay.

20.name: Forest's Wrath
20.description: Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30%, its speed by 20%, and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

20.name: Boundless Stride
20.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 20 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

20.name: Galloping Gait
20.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

20.name: Abolish Magic
20.description: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.
